series.name: ダンダダン / DAN DA DAN

cards.title: Psychic Girl, Momo Ayase
cards.description: Momo awakens her latent spiritual power to protect Okarun from hostile spirits.

cards.title: Street Clothes, Momo Ayase
cards.description: When Momo enters the stage you may give another Occult character +2000 power for the turn.

cards.title: Determined Smile, Momo Ayase
cards.description: Assist: All of your characters in front of this card get +1500 power.

cards.title: Nerve of Steel, Momo Ayase
cards.description: On attack you may draw a card, then discard a card to focus on the enemy.

cards.title: Psychic Barrage, Momo Ayase
cards.description: During your turn this card gains +1500 power if you control another Occult character.

cards.title: Nighttime Patrol, Momo Ayase
cards.description: When this card attacks you may pay 1 to look at up to three cards from your deck and rearrange them.

cards.title: Turbo Form, Ken "Okarun" Takakura
cards.description: When played from hand look at the top card of your deck and either keep or send to waiting room.

cards.title: Resolve of Okarun
cards.description: When this card attacks if you have two or more Occult characters draw a card and discard a card.

cards.title: Sprinting Escape, Okarun
cards.description: On attack choose one of your characters and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

cards.title: Possessed Lightning, Okarun
cards.description: CX combo: When this card attacks with "Turbo Engine" give it +3000 power and on reverse send the opponent to clock.

cards.title: Loyal Friend, Okarun
cards.description: During the opponent's turn if you control another Occult character this card gains +2000 power.

cards.title: Turbo Bicycle, Okarun
cards.description: When this card attacks you may pay 1 to search your deck for a Occult character and add it to hand.

cards.title: Idol Aspirations, Aira Shiratori
cards.description: When played you may mill two cards. If there was a climax among them choose one Occult character and it gets +2000 power.

cards.title: School Idol Uniform, Aira
cards.description: When this card attacks reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Occult character add it to hand.

cards.title: Star Performer, Aira
cards.description: When this card becomes reversed you may pay 1 to rest this card.

cards.title: Spiritual Backing, Aira
cards.description: During your opponent's turn this card gains +3000 power.

cards.title: Idol's Pep Talk, Aira
cards.description: When this card attacks all of your characters gain +500 power for the turn.

cards.title: Festival Stage, Aira
cards.description: Experience If the total level in your level zone is 4 or more this card gets +2000 power.

cards.title: Exorcist Veteran, Seiko Ayase
cards.description: When played from hand choose one of your characters and it gains +2000 power for the turn.

cards.title: Warm Smile, Seiko
cards.description: Brainstorm Pay 1 and rest two characters: reveal four cards, add an Occult character for each climax revealed.

cards.title: Barrier Technique, Seiko
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage you may rest one of your characters to give another character +3000 power.

cards.title: Seasoned Negotiator, Seiko
cards.description: When this card attacks if you control another Occult character this card gains +4000 power.

cards.title: Tea Time Advice, Seiko
cards.description: When this card is reversed you may pay 1 to send it to memory and return it at the start of your next draw phase.

cards.title: Occult Scholar, Seiko
cards.description: On play search your deck for up to two Occult characters and reveal them to your opponent.

cards.title: Mischievous Spirit, Turbo Granny
cards.description: When played choose one of your opponent's characters and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn.

cards.title: Reluctant Ally, Turbo Granny
cards.description: Alarm If this card is on top of your clock all of your Occult characters gain +500 power.

cards.title: Racing Ghost, Turbo Granny
cards.description: Encore Put a Occult character from your hand into waiting room.

cards.title: Cackling Specter, Turbo Granny
cards.description: When this card enters the stage choose an opponent's character and that character gets -3000 power until end of turn.

cards.title: Old-School Spirit, Turbo Granny
cards.description: Act Rest this card: choose one of your characters and that character gains +1500 power for the turn.

cards.title: Turbo Trickery, Turbo Granny
cards.description: When this card becomes reversed you may pay 1 to send it to memory and return rested at start of next draw phase.

cards.title: Childhood Friend, Jiji
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage look at up to two cards from top of deck and rearrange them.

cards.title: Smile to Protect, Jiji
cards.description: On attack this card gains +1000 power for each other Occult character you control.

cards.title: Possessed Form, Jiji
cards.description: If you have two or more other Occult characters this card gains +2000 power and hand encore.

cards.title: Purifying Flames, Jiji
cards.description: CX combo: on attack you may pay 1 to burn 1 damage to your opponent.

cards.title: After-School Duty, Jiji
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage from hand you may pay 1 to search your deck for a Occult character.

cards.title: Heroic Stand, Jiji
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage choose one of your characters and it gains +3000 power and hexproof for the turn.

cards.title: Alien Ally, Vamola
cards.description: When played you may choose one of your characters and that character gains +1000 power and +1 soul.

cards.title: Dinosaur Suit, Vamola
cards.description: When this card becomes reversed you may pay 1 to salvage a Occult character from your waiting room.

cards.title: Genuine Smile, Vamola
cards.description: If you have two or more other Occult characters this card gains +2000 power.

cards.title: Secret Refugee, Vamola
cards.description: When this card attacks if you control another Alien character deal 1 damage to your opponent.

cards.title: Protective Instinct, Vamola
cards.description: At the start of your climax phase choose one of your characters and it gets +1500 power for the turn.

cards.title: Festival Parade, Vamola
cards.description: When played from hand draw two cards then discard a card.

cards.title: Serpoian Foot Soldier
cards.description: When played you may rest another Occult character to give this card +3000 power until end of turn.

cards.title: Serpoian Tactician
cards.description: Act Pay 1 rest this card: look at up to two cards from top of deck and rearrange them.

cards.title: Serpoian Commander
cards.description: When this card attacks if you have another Alien character this card gains +2000 power.

cards.title: Serpoian Assault Team
cards.description: CX combo On attack if "Alien Invasion" is in your climax slot deal 1 damage and this card gains +4000 power.

cards.title: Serpoian Scout
cards.description: When this card is played you may pay 1 to search your deck for an Alien character.

cards.title: Serpoian Strategist
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage choose up to one opponent's character and rest it.

cards.title: Evil Eye Manifestation
cards.description: When this card attacks if you have two or more other Occult characters this card gets +2500 power.

cards.title: Evil Eye Overload
cards.description: Alarm If this card is on top of your clock at the start of your climax phase you may draw a card.

cards.title: Evil Eye's Gaze
cards.description: When this card becomes reversed you may rest it and give another character +1000 power.

cards.title: Evil Eye Catastrophe
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage choose one of your opponent's level 3 or lower characters and put it into stock.

cards.title: Evil Eye Residual Aura
cards.description: During your turn if you control another Occult character this card gains +2000 power.

cards.title: Evil Eye Researcher, Momo
cards.description: When this card enters stage you may pay 1 to salvage an Occult character from waiting room.

cards.title: Duo on the Rooftop, Momo & Okarun
cards.description: When played draw a card then discard a card. All your characters gain +500 power.

cards.title: Shared Resolve, Momo & Aira
cards.description: When this card attacks choose one of your characters and it gains +X power equal to the number of Occult characters ×500.

cards.title: Dawn of Heroes, Okarun & Jiji
cards.description: On attack if you have four or more characters this card gains +3500 power.

cards.title: Occult Research Club Meeting
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage from hand reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Occult character put it into your hand.

cards.title: Liberation of Turbo Granny
cards.description: When this card attacks you may pay 2 to burn 2 damage.

cards.title: Vow Beneath the Stars
cards.description: When this card is placed on stage you may heal 1 damage. CX combo On attack if "Meteor Shower of Feelings" is in your climax zone burn 1 damage.
